content: Property Resale HDB Asked by AnonymousAsked on 30 Apr 2019What would you do when HDB Resale Price falls?Recently, HDB resale prices declined by 0.3% q-o-q in the first quarter of this year, compared to the 0.2% q-o-q decline in the previous quarter, according to the latest statistics by the Housing and Development Board (HDB). https://www.edgeprop.sg/property-news/hdb-resale-prices-fall-03-third-consecutive-decline1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Chin Guo QiangLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 13 May 2019Hold on if your current flat is HDB Resale flat. For buyers, the implication won’t be very volatile since flat prices don’t move a lot.This can be a potential time period for good deals on HDB Resale Flats, if coupled with good bank housing loan deals (Housing Lian % falling below 1.8% that is)0 comments0
